name: Slime Splash (Sirlix)
description:
You are a slime in a scary dungeon trying to kill as many mummies as possible. Pick up slime ammo that changes your color and use that to paint mummies to the corresponding color then lure the mummies into traps that only activates when they color match the traps color.
  1. shoot paint - LMB (left mouse button)
  2. move - WASD
  3. change color - mouse scroll

This game was made for the Mini Jam 62: Colors game jam
